replies.replyText: Who are you?
We know you sell information, perhaps you can help us?
We have information about a stranded Rogue ship, that has destroyed one of your spaceships, but was heavily damaged and is now unable to move. We can sell you information about its location
We require your assistance. Our homeworld is threatened by Obliterator and we need all help we can get in order to save as much as possible.
Oops, sorry, pushed wrong button. Bye.
Can you tell a bit about yourself?
Oh, I know, you are the famous interstellar traders?

2.npcText: We are pleased Klisk are known. We make trade now?

replies.replyText: No, thanks, we don't have anything to trade right now

3.npcText: Klisk are traders. And diplomats. We make connections. Between species.

replies.replyText: And what do you offer, exactly?
But any service has a price, right?
That's all we need for now, goodbye.

4.npcText: Klisk offer technology and equipment. Klisk offer information about space and other species. Klisk offer support and translation in communication with species from other classes

replies.replyText: Other classes?
Good, but we have more questions

5.npcText: Right. Klisk provide interstellar currency. Credits. All Klisk services are paid with it.

replies.replyText: Credits? How we can get them?
I see. We have more questions

6.npcText: All sentinent beings are divided into classes. Species withing same class can theoretically understand each other. You are from most common 2nd class.

replies.replyText: So you are also from second class if we can communicate?
I see. Now back to my other questions...

7.npcText: Yes. But Klisk are unique, we can communicate with species of 1st and 5th classes.

replies.replyText: Why is it so difficult?
Are there other species who can do it?

8.npcText: Different ways of communication. And more, different mind and logic. Impossible to understand for beings from other classes. Except for us. Klisk are flexible.

replies.replyText: Are there other species who can do it?

9.npcText: Gardeners can. It is hard to say if there is anything they can not do.

replies.replyText: Gardeners?
I guess you are right... now back to my other questions

10.npcText: Ancient and powerful race. If you haven't yet seen them you will soon. They always contact and welcome newcomers.

replies.replyText: Ok, i want to ask something more

11.npcText: Can get them by selling valuable technology and information to Klisk. Or some other species that use Klisk credits.

replies.replyText: We have some spare resources, can we convert them to credits?
Ok, we will remember that for future

12.npcText: No. Raw resources are rarely needed by advanced space-travelling species. Only technology and knowledge have value.

replies.replyText: Ok, i want to ask something more
We have encountered strangely identical star systems... <tell all the information>

14.npcText: Twin starsystems. We know about it. Knowledge is quite common and not a secret. It is worth just 1 credit.

replies.replyText: Deal. Here is your credit.
Too expensive for 'quite common knowledge'. We will find it ourselves

15.npcText: We are interested. We will pay 10 credits for this information.

replies.replyText: Deal. Transferring its coordinates now...
No, that's not enough.

100.npcText: Klisk can provide part of Trade Fleet for your needs. Freighting fleet capable of evacuating 10 000 beings / month for remaining time of existence of your homeworld will cost you 10 credits

replies.replyText: Deal. Here are your credits.
No, this is not acceptable for us.
